title: [Health] Lipid peroxidation linking diabetes and cancer; the importance of 4-hydroxynonenal -- we propose that the major bioactive product of oxidative degradation of polyunsaturated fatty acids (PUFAs), the reactive aldehyde (4-HNE), may be the key pathogenic factor linking diabetes and cancer
